main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 6 Aug 1947 in Philadelphia, Penn. The object was observed to be moving very fast in a straight flight at a size described as larger than usual.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 2230 - 2245 EST, with the object described as white in color and emitting a slight buzzing sound after passing.
The location of the sighting was specified as the Fort of Palindrome in Elkins Park, Philadelphia, Penn.
The form indicates the observation was made from the ground, and the maneuver of the object was listed as 'apparently straight flight.'
The report mentions that there was only one object observed and it was moving at a speed described as 'very fast' in a direction of 130 degrees.
The document indicates that the observation was unclassified, and it is stamped as such with additional unidentifiable signatures and approvals.
